Reviews.Content: I purchased the Nikon Coolpix s550 a few days before a vacation trip, so did not have time to read the manual.  It takes great pictures.  I tried a few of moving objects at a distance just for fun and they come out very clear. I highly recommend this camera.I read several reviews and found many of them very helpful.  I do not think the "ISO noise" is valid for a regular joe photographer also battery loading difficulty is not valid battery loads easy and charges quickly.This is a great little camera, the battery lasts a long time between charges & with a 4 gig SD (add separately) it holds a buttload of pictures.  I like it & in fact it fits so well in my pocket I have taken it with me the last few days of a trade show - got some pics I would not have gotten with a bulkier camera because I would not have wanted to lug a big camera.V

Reviews.Title: CoolPiX S550 the Ultimate
Reviews.Author: Dorothy
Reviews.Content: This camera is more than you can imagine packed in a small package.  I love the features I have used and let 3 people hold it that ending up purchasing this camera.  My only drawback is the size. It is small  and handles well, but I am so afraid of missing the case or my pocket and losing it.  The optical Zoom is a bomb.  I have a popular digital SLR, but I am hooked on this camera for performance and convenience.  I recommend for beginners or pros.

Reviews.Title: Perpetual Disappointment  Machine
Reviews.Author: Isfahan
Reviews.Content: Like a hapless rube, I was bedazzled by the bold announcement of the 10Mb feature on this instrument while perusing the digital camera section of a local retailer.  The camera exhibited all the features designed to beguile me:brainless photography, with professional results, was just a click away with this camera of wonders.  The apologists for this camera will claim that perfect results only come to those with the patience to pour through the instruction manual, negotiating their way,  Thesus-like, through this confusing and inscrutable Cretan's Labyrinth towards excellence.  I did, but I failed to vanquish this beast.  None of the suggestions in the manual yielded any change to the blurry and thoroughly objectionable photographs I had subsequently taken.  The event, and the picture of the event, were at such a wide variance that there is almost a suggestion that the camera was taking pictures of some bizarre parallel universe.  I've had some small experience with digital cameras in the past, and in those instances I was able to achieve wonderful results without fiddling with a thousand buttons and features to maximize each and every shot; I'd simply point and shoot and be left with a dazzling photograph.  With this blunderbuss, it was always a crap shoot even with the instruction manual committed to memory, and fine tuning every shot like a physicist operating a tunneling electron microscope.  This camera will be given away to my most dreaded enemy as a punishment.

Reviews.Title: A lot of problems
Reviews.Author: Gosia
Reviews.Content: Purchase around Mother's Day.I decided to purchase the Nikon since I have a D50.To summarize the problems:Couple weeks after purchase the shutter would not close and the camera would not shut down without taking the battery out. The camera was in repair  ( Best Buy) for a month.Right after I got it back it would not read ANY memory card without taking the card in and out several times or at all. Plus the camera would not shut down again without taking the battery out.Went back to Best Buy . Had the camera services for the memory card reader error and the shut down. The camera was in service for a month again. Just received the camera back yesterday and again the camera has a problem reading the memory card. So far it is shutting down.Best Buy's policy is to bring the camera in 4 times before it is considered a lemon. No matter if it is the same problem. I am taking it back to Best Buy today.Stay away from this camera. The pictures are not nice. My brother purchased a Cannon and it takes a lot better pictures and he has no problem with it.Hope it helps.

Reviews.Title: Product Listing has incorrect features!
Reviews.Author: Karl F. Allen
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera assuming the detailed description of included features was accurate but it isn't- at least in one regard which was the selling point for me: the 'stop-motion movie' mode which it lists in the final paragraph description.This was the one I spotted, but there could be others. For this, and all other cameras and electronic equipment listed on Amazon I will be double-checking the manufacturers website in the future.In this case, here's the link to Nikon's own page on the S550:[...]

Reviews.Title: Smart Camera
Reviews.Author: Grandma "scrapbooker"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item because I saw it in action when my adult daughter purchased one.  When I saw a camera that could recognize a "smile" and also recognize "closed eyes", I knew I had to have this smart device.  I haven't yet mastered all the possibilities, but it is easy to get started and take pictures, review them, delete if necessary.  I'm enjoying it!!!

Reviews.Title: Still using this camera after over 5 years
Reviews.Author: Red's Mom
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace a similar camera that was lost on a trip.  It's been over 5 years and we still use this camera regularly as our "party camera."  It's been dropped a couple of times, but the casing is very sturdy.  We charge the battery before we take it out for use and battery life hasn't been an issue.  Sometimes the auto focus doesn't work, but that may be user error.

Reviews.Title: COOL camera
Reviews.Author: M. Jackson
Reviews.Content: COOL camera. The item was expected. Takes good pictures and great for a point and shoot camera. Small and compact design is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera!
Reviews.Author: joyuslion
Reviews.Content: This little camera is awesome! I have a Nikon DSLR... but carry this one around because it is small and takes almost just as good pics! The flash on this baby is better then my DSLR for pics inside! I love it!

Reviews.Title: I was very excited to receive this
Reviews.Author: Mrs Bryan1
Reviews.Content: I loved this camera while it worked. It wasn't new and it lasted about a year. Shipped quickly and was as described

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: TommyGun
Reviews.Content: Bought this a few years ago, I still have it, and still use it. Takes good pictures, and really easy to work with.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Abby Joan
Reviews.Content: I bought this one for myself and I love it.  Sometimes its a little hard to keep my hand steady so I have to take the pics again but I do alot of still photos so its ok.  I take alot of pics of my work before I sell it so if anything doesnt come out right then I fix it on the computer later.

Reviews.Title: Took Great Pics with this tiny little thing
Reviews.Author: Karen  Miles
Reviews.Content: I would have given this a 5 but it didn't come with a charger for the battery.  It didn't say that it would, but I wasn't aware that one was needed either.  Thankful, I found an inexpensive charger and it arrived in time for my trip.  It takes great pics.

Reviews.Title: Good but seller was misleading
Reviews.Author: Johnny Bravo
Reviews.Content: The camera works well but there is a big problem that shows up after the first year or around there. It's the lens error message. Nikon claims it's because the camera was dropped but it happens to almost everyone almost like clock work. Like it's "programed to happen and you'll have to get it serviced from Nikon for about $100.00 + shipping and handling. Getting the picture yet. Mine was used on Vacation Never dropped and I took about 50 pictures and then it went into the draw. We went to a party and guess what, A lens error no more camera. Google this model and lens error before buying this camera. I'm not going to bother with returning for a "service" and going to buy a new camera at my Costco store since they give a two year return to store guarantee. No not another Nikon....

Reviews.Title: The Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Darke_Dreamuh
Reviews.Content: I got the camera two days before the first due date. It was in the exact condition as the information provided and came with everything specified. The last camera I had I was missing the button to snap the photo and wasn't the desired color I like and this one is. I hope it will serve all my purposes.

Reviews.Title: Great but kinda scratched
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: Works excellent glad I bought it but it's excessively scratched... Wish the description would of said something about how worn it was.

Reviews.Title: Small, Durable, Great Resolution
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: This was our primary camera for a while, but was replaced by our new DSLR (which isn't really a comparison). It has now been relegated to use by our kids who drag it just about everywhere and still manage to get good pictures with it. It's got high resolution (10 MP) and the zoom is great for the camera's size (5x Optical). For under $200 it's a great camera for capturing what's happening around you. It's a huge step up from the cell phone camera most people use now days, but doesn't take up a ton of room. I recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix
Reviews.Author: bernardo
Reviews.Content: my first camera but it takes great pictures and good videos very happy with it its a good camera to start out with i would recommend it

Reviews.Title: Great small point and shoot
Reviews.Author: buckmore2000
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera for every day point and shoot type opportunities. I've had this almost a year now, and have been very pleased. I have a 4GB SD card and it has never been filled up on a vacation.The only can is recharge time between shots. If you don't use flash, no problem. If you do us flash, then like many Nikon Coolpix models, it takes a few seconds to recharge before you can look at the picture you just took, or take another picture. Other than this, great camera!Also, this model goes on sale under $120 that I have seen a few times. Good luck :)

Reviews.Title: great only if it's sunny
Reviews.Author: deedee
Reviews.Content: To be fair, i'm not an avid photographer, but this camera cannot take good pictures in low light.  I have tried every setting, had camera snobs look at it, read the manual cover to cover, and every pic taken in low light looks horrible.  I am so frustrated that I am going to get a cannon point and shoot like everyone else in my family.  They get the most amazing pictures with little effort in any condition.On bright sunny days, I get fantastic looking pics, especially using the macro function for gorgeous close ups.  But God forbid the sun goes down or I go indoors, cause that's the end of that.  I'm not kidding, i've had experts look at my camera and they think i just got a bad one, but i'm not too sure.  I'll just get a cannon.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: S. Gallager "Munchkin"
Reviews.Content: This has been my best point and shoot camera yet and I've played with many other the last few years. I can actually take professional pictures with this camera even though it wasn't designed for it. In fact I'm about to upgrade to a professional camera, but I refuse to get rid of this little camera even then. It fits easily in my pocket, takes great photos, has several scene settings for all occasions, and can take several beatings. I think I've dropped the camera about a hundred times and it still works! Only thing I've ever busted on this camera was the cover door to where you place the batter and sd card, but that was from it falling out of my purse onto a driveway. Even with that busted though it is still going strong! Best tip I have for this camera is that when you use the digital zoom, use a tripod! The regular zoom works great on its own, but once you add that extra zoom (when you cross the little bar on the screen) the pictures come out blurry without a tripod, but this happens with all cameras with digital zoom.Overall, I'd say it's like wrapping up a professional quality camera into a point and shoot camera that anyone can use!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for great price
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: Nikon's are always great buys and this is no different! Small, but great pic quality and easy to use. So glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Our second Nikon S550.  Great camera, Great service!!!!!
Reviews.Author: John W. Meara "Consumer"
Reviews.Content: Had our original Nikon S550 for three years....Dropped on cement, dropped to the bottom of a lake....  Kept working like a workhorse.....  So when the last accident claimed it, bought the new model.....  We prefer the older simpler and clearly better S550.....  Found one on Amazon....  Hope there are always a few around!!!!!  Oh...  Outstanding service from Amazon allowed us to take it on our vacation...

Reviews.Title: coolpix is cool
Reviews.Author: Ronald Fairchild
Reviews.Content: This camera, Coolpix, was used but no real damage. It is a great size for travel and that is why I bought it. Took it to Isreal and took many good pictures. Was a real good buy.

Reviews.Title: Love Nikon
Reviews.Author: Ssantiago
Reviews.Content: Love nikon my 1st real camera had it for 2years now and it  never let me down.. Clear nice pics

Reviews.Title: Nifty Nikon
Reviews.Author: Sharon Beverly
Reviews.Content: This is one nifty little camera.  Since I'm not a techie, but I do compose my pictures pretty well, I have an appreciation and desire for more than a drugstore camera.The Nikon S550 takes a crisp picture.  When compared with the shots of someone using a professional camera, this one held its own--even taking portrait-style close-ups.  One of the features I find useful is that even if your hand moves, the camera has the ability to stabilize the image.I used my camera extensively while shopping for and remodeling our home.  I was able to capture the items, their exact colors, and was so on-target that, our decorator was amazed at the accuracy.  Even the individual colors of the wool and silk in oriental rugs were quite visible.When taking photos of our belongings (we live in a hurricane-prone area)both the short and long-range pictures were of very good quality.PROS:*  Ease-of-Use*  Thin*  Lightweight*  Accurate color*  Excellent even at long-distance shots*  Superb value for the price*  Can take videos*  Recharges quicklyCONS:*  Does not have a number indicator to quickly find a previously taken pictureEven my dad, who is accustomed to expensive cameras with assorted lenses is impressed with this little camera.  He intends to buy one, too!

Reviews.Title: Great until it broke
Reviews.Author: A. Collatz "Gus3099"
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for slightly over one year, and it worked perfectly up until this past week.  The flash doesn't work, and now the camera isn't being recognized on my computer, so I can't upload photos. I thought Nikon was a good brand, but apparently the camera breaks as soon as your warranty expires.  Two thumbs down.

Reviews.Title: THIS CAMERA HAS ISSUES
Reviews.Author: OLDS "You Understand!!!"
Reviews.Content: Every time you turn the camera on you have to set the date and time. It worked fine for a few months and then it went bad. The problem about it is that there was so many reviews complaining about this same problem and I ignored it. It is very frustrating, because when you need to take a picture right away you can't because the camera won't take a picture unless you set the date and time and obviously you can't catch a shot when it is happening because of this and you can't leave the camera on until it happens because it automatically shuts down after being on so long(which I guess is a good thing). This simply is quite annoying and I have used a Sony that has no similar problem. It is less megapixels but I guess less megapixels is better than no picture at all.

Reviews.Title: Video files won't transfer
Reviews.Author: Parby Grylam "Grylam"
Reviews.Content: I've been using the S550 for about a year now. I had brief problem a few months ago with the lens sticking in zoom position, but after some gentle coaxing, that seems to have gone away.My main gripe about the camera is the software. I find I am unable to transfer video files from the camera to my Mac with OS X. When I press the transfer button it tells me the camera has become disconnected. This is why I rated it a 2 on ease of use. I suppose I will have to acquire a card reader. Individual snapshots are easily imported in iPhoto.I also find that I miss the viewfinder I had on my old Canon. Often the sun totally wipes out the viewing screen, meaning that the shot is poorly aligned or the subject has moved on while I adjust to the angle of the sun.I would like a larger on/off button.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Viviana Cremasco
Reviews.Content: easy to use, great pictures and I love the panorama feature! very nice camera at a good price

Reviews.Title: I love my NIKON
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Finkelstein
Reviews.Content: I've been through 3 digital cameras. My first one was a Kodak and it worked even though I dropped it all the time. Second one was a CASIO that kept breaking. Then another CASIO as a gift, and guess what?--That broke too! Finally I got my NIKON coolpix! And I love it! The pictures come out crystal clear! I upload all my acting and singing videos on sites like TalentTrove all the time. Never have a problem! You have so many options to use for whatever kind of photo you want to take. Best camera I've ever owned. I recommend it to everyone! It also have tons of memory!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: shoppin' momma
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I wanted to buy a smaller, portable camera for trips.  The color and of course the brand are what helped me to make my final decision.  My only complaints are sometimes the lighting is poor, and sometimes the image stabilization is ineffective.  Overall, the size is very small, not bulky, and slips into my pocket.  The video is GREAT! I am satisfied with 95% of the overall picture performance.

Reviews.Title: Great For The Price, Before The Price Was Doubled.
Reviews.Author: Ellie Biskey
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my birthday in November last year. Since then, it has been perfect for my every need. But, for whatever reason, the price has been doubled since I got mine. In 2008, it cost only $168.00. A couple months later, I heard from my brother that it was taken off the market temporarily. Obviously, it's back (or maybe just in stock until they sell them all, which would explain the price) but now it costs a fortune. You might as well go get a pro camera now. However, I would recommend this camera if you are just looking for a camera that will take basic, quick pictures or if you are loaded or willing to pay the hefty price.Pros:-Great Quality-Good Basic Pictures and Portraits-Cool Effects-UNBELIEVABLE ZOOM!!-Quick start-upCons:-terribly slow shutter speed (meaning NO movement for 5 seconds while taking the picture or it will most likely blur.-'eh' macro (I wouldn't neccesarily say it was bad, but you can't get very close to anything and make it look professional without holding some kind of a lens up to the lens. I hope that wasn't too confusing)-Indivisual battery charge (meaning that you can't take pictures while it's charging. That's probably normal but I found it kinda lame. You have to take the battery out to charge it)I usually have high expectations for a camera, though, because I want to be a photographer. For this price the way it is, I would say it's not worth it. I'm going to buy a canon rebel xs that would be 10 times the camera this one is for not even twice as much.But this camera is a GREAT point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Not very happy
Reviews.Author: Nicole Lunczynski
Reviews.Content: I have a prof. camera but I wanted something small for concerts and events the camera was just getting to heavy, so I bought this package with the camera, memory, and case I was so happy when it got here I took it out right away took a picture or two it seemed fine but then again I wasnt really looking for problems so I said this is so perfect.  Well I set it in the case on the shelf about 2-3 months go by and I go to get the camera down to take to a concert and  sometimes I get an error message " Lens error "  and then sometimes when I turn it on it seems fine untill you take a picture and try to look at it up close on the screen and its not focusing so i guess something might have happened during shipping I dont know, but its to late to return it  so make sure yours gets used a lot when you first get it.

Reviews.Title: NIKON CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Connie
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  Gave as gifts to my children. Have taken many wonderful photos, easy to use, stores a lot with the memory card.  Easy to use download to computer.  Great value.

Reviews.Title: Not good for low light conditions
Reviews.Author: Serethia A. Haggard
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with the quality of the images this camera takes but you have to be outside in the sun or able to use the flash or it's gonna be very blurry. I took it on vacation and took a lot of awesome pictures and I have taken a lot of good pictures at home of my animals and stuff but after a lot of playing with settings I realized that it has to have a good amount of light.I am very impressed with the video it captures. All of the videos we have taken with it have turned out clear and have pretty good audio.I took it to a concert that allowed cameras and I didn't want to flash everybody's eyes out so I played with all of the settings and could not come up with a good image. I turned the ISO up to 400 and you could see everything but it was very blurry. The only way I could get it to take a good image was to sit it on a table and capture an image with the timer. The night portrait setting takes pretty good pics at night but it uses a flash and if anything is moving it has bad motion blur. We took some video of the show and the turned out very good though.

Reviews.Title: nice little camera
Reviews.Author: J. Baker
Reviews.Content: Great pictures for the price. Just point and shoot. The video feature is great too, easy to use. Not all the bells and whistles w/some cameras but excellent value and just what an average picture-taker (and someone hard on her cameras!) needs.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: SPR2
Reviews.Content: Solid camera, small. Great success as a gift. I went with the P6000 for myself but must admit I often think of buying one of these as well.

Reviews.Title: best camera I have had
Reviews.Author: J. Sawyer
Reviews.Content: Takes very clear pictures.  I love the black and white and sephia color options also they make very beautiful photos.  This is by far the best camera I have owned.

Reviews.Title: cool 550
Reviews.Author: B. Hinz "herbertharoldherman"
Reviews.Content: For starters the software loads on the computer like a dream KISS and they did.  We have not really touched all the features this camera supports.  My wife grabbed the camera went to a lambing with the grandson and came home with terrific pictures.  So for those of you imtimidated by the techno, go for it, very easy to charge the battery and get started.I have some reading to do before Easter to enable me to use some of the available features with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: D. Durden
Reviews.Content: This camera is compact and has a lot of cool features.  Most important, it takes great photos that are very sharp and clear.

Reviews.Title: Good Purchase
Reviews.Author: Crash
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a gift for our daughter in college. It arrived on time and she has found it easy to use. She was able to take good pictures right away, without having to read the manual.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: Janice L. Richmond
Reviews.Content: This is a great compact camera that is easy to use and takes clear pictures.  It is small enough to fit in your purse and takes better pictures than my full size Cannon.

Reviews.Title: Really Cool
Reviews.Author: Senthilkumar Elangovan "Esen"
Reviews.Content: Its easy to handle, very portable, my mom loves it and understood easily how to operate it. The resolution of the picture is good.

Reviews.Title: A little camera with a big heart!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "circared"
Reviews.Content: This camera outperformed other small cameras of its class, and proved that it is worth the price I paid. I was overjoyed to see my "little" nikon work its magic at a wedding reception. It had a fantastic battery life, the pictures were clear and precise and most importantly, it did not disappoint!

Reviews.Title: Nikon S550 automatic camera
Reviews.Author: Husker Joe
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the non-professional who wants to be able to point-and-click and get good pictures. The setup to use it is very minimal and easy.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: justadab
Reviews.Content: I used it for an American Girl DOll" photo shoot with a bunch of 12 year old girls using the camera and then viewing the pictures on the big screen TV.  Then I did a quick download to the computer to edit and make cds for all the girls.Super easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Cool Pix Camera
Reviews.Author: B. E. Colatosti
Reviews.Content: very happy with product. Came as described. Priced right for the quality, and takes good photos.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value...Great pics from a compact camera.
Reviews.Author: L. John
Reviews.Content: Would recommend this camera for anyone who is traveling.  Used this camera in Italy on a recent vacation.  Portraits, indoor, and outdoor pictures turned out great.  Easy to adjust for different photo needs as well.

Reviews.Title: incredible camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Brett Camp
Reviews.Content: amazing camera.. i got it for my girlfriend for christmas and its a very high quality piece of equipment  a must buy!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S550
Reviews.Author: Jean Hernandez "dezzi87"
Reviews.Content: This Camera is great, especially for the price. You won't find another 10mp 5x optical zoom camera for this price, especially from a solid brand such as nikon.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: I. De Oliveira "Newpolediva"
Reviews.Content: This is a handy little camera with really BIG features.  It does a host of numerous little effects and provides lots of video potential as well.

Reviews.Title: Quite pleased.
Reviews.Author: Arvid L. Axelson
Reviews.Content: Nikon Coolpix S550 seems to be just as touted.  A fine piece of machinery.  We are very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: N. Schmid
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a gift for my daughter, she wanted the purple camera for the holidays. I researched it and knowing that Nikon has a good name, decided to buy it. It is sleak and stylish and works very well. I think that the price was a little high, mainly because of the color, this is the only reason I witheld one star. Great camera, she's very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Camera review
Reviews.Author: Karen Ford
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my daughter who absolutely loves it!!!  Says it is easy to use, lightweight and "cool"

Reviews.Title: be careful of getting a used/defective product
Reviews.Author: doc "stan"
Reviews.Content: I have bought electronic products from Amazon and it seems I end up getting a defective products. The Nikon coolpix is a great camera but have it checked completely as the display screen was grainy and fuzzy. There was also clicking sounds. I had to return the product and get a replacement. So far it seems ok. We will see how it goes.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Donna Gurliaccio
Reviews.Content: I love it. I've waited a long time to get a great camera like this. It does all the cool new stuff. I'm still learning how to use it and having a ball.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: grranimall
Reviews.Content: I really wanted the Sony DSC-W120, but I could never find them on sale. Then I noticed this one that was 10 megapixels vs 7, had 5x zoom vs 3, and it was $40 cheaper than the Sony! I'm sure the cost will come as time goes by, but I happy with this purchase. It has alot of features that I have played with that I am learning to use. Even though the battery isn't found on your local Wal-Mart shelf, it lasts a very long time so I don't think I will even need a spare. I shoot mostly photos though, although you could shoot video, it's quality is decent enough that I wouldn't mind watching a 10 minute video or so. Overall, I think you will be happy with this camera, especially if you find it for less than $140.

Reviews.Title: Nikon CoolPIX, for a dummy
Reviews.Author: Marilyn D. Kagan "Jewelry designer"
Reviews.Content: I was able to use it right away, after someone helped me with the date and time, which I don't want recorded on the photo.I went to the museum to photograph the glass exhibit by Dale Chihuly, the foremost glass artist alive today in the USA, who encourages people to photograph his work. The photos were very easy to take, once I got it, that one doesn't put one's eye on the camera. Boy, the world is so different now! The photos came out just fine, except that the pink lights on one exhibit were washed out. The rest of the photos are better than I ever expected, bright and clear. The camera is small, light, easy to handle and easy to carry. The plum color is cool, too!Marilyn Kagan, Providence, RI

Reviews.Title: My COOL NIKON
Reviews.Author: Brenda Robinson
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome, it is the perfect size for your purse, so you can take it everywhere.It's just what I wanted, something simple without a whole lot of buttons (you rarely ever use).

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: O. Fisher "Orabbits"
Reviews.Content: The item was just what we were looking for.  We wanted something compact and easy to use.  Everything was easy to follow.  Couldn't ask for anything better.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Catherine M. Stringer
Reviews.Content: I wanted something that would take good quality point and shoot photos but not spend a whole lot on other features that I would rarely, if ever, use.  This was a great purchase.  The menu is straight forward and switching the settings between shots is quick.  The lcd screen lacks MPs, but as long as the photos turn out great, who cares what they look like on the camera.

Reviews.Title: Nikon CoolPix
Reviews.Author: A. Gobea
Reviews.Content: I received my order in a timely fashion! The Nikon Coolpix S550 speaks for it's self. My daughter has been using it since she opened the package. Thanks, for a wonderful product!

Reviews.Title: Quality Built and Solid Feel
Reviews.Author: Billyspeed "billyspeed"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Nikon Coolpix camera.  Loved the first one and this one is even better.  Xlnt features.  Nice display.  Solid feel and, most importantly, really good pictures.  A little heavier than some of the competitors but this contributes to the quality fit and finish.  Feels like a real camera, not a toy.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Gavlarb
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera & I absolutely love it!  I have taken more pictures since I have bought it than I have ever taken before.  I am not yet familiar with the different settings, but am very pleased with the quality of the pictures.  There is a short delay on some settings & some settings are more shake sensitive than others.  I have taken many pics that included sports, kids, & animals, both indoors & outdoors & I have not been disappointed yet.  Overall, the camera is very user friendly & is definitely worth the money!

Reviews.Title: I Love this camera !!
Reviews.Author: Sue F
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera!  It's smaller than my last camera... it has 3 more megapixels than my last camera... it has a more powerful zoom than my last camera... and it cost less than my last camera!  And still with a high quality lens like Nikon always uses. It takes video too. And you could put it on a tripod and watch a plant grow by setting it to take photos at timed intervals.

Reviews.Title: A little noise always hurts someone
Reviews.Author: Vegetherrien
Reviews.Content: I'm an advanced amateur photographer and I usually shoot with a Rebel XT. I love it to pieces, but I really needed something smaller for everyday use. I received a Nikon Coolpix S550 as a Christmas gift, and I had great expectations for it. I really, really wanted to love it. Heck, I would have settled for liking it. But honestly, I knew from the beginning it was a doomed relationship. There was too much lag between button-push and actual picture taking. Part of it's red-eye reduction (which does not work as often as I would like) was multiple flashing, which was jarring if you were the subject. When shooting on auto or actually changing to a set mode, say to "Indoor/Party mode", images appeared entirely too noisy. If noise was not an issue, then it was the flash being too intense, and a result, I had to mess around with the exposure. Its vibration reduction technology was virtually non existent. The slightest bit of camera shake or movement by subjects left the image blurred or with a halo. I grew really impatient trying to adjust ISO, exposure, flash compensation and whatnot just to get a clean image. Bottom line: overall image quality was really unimpressive. If you can't just leave it on A and shoot, then what's the purpose in a P&S; in the first place? I just don't believe I should have to adjust modes or white balance every time to get a decent photo. Also, navigating the menus was tedious. I know Nikon is a superb camera manufacturer. Their high-end DSLRs are out of this world. But something, and it's a BIG something, is really missing from this little camera.Today I exchanged it for a Canon Powershot SD790, and I am already impressed. Maybe it's because I already own a Canon, but the menus were super easy to navigate. I just picked it up, left it on auto and started shooting. I shot indoors and outdoors, never changed a setting and I am very happy with the clarity of the images. All the usual modes are still there, and then some. I have not captured red eye yet. I can even go into manual if I'm feeling finicky. There is much less lag between button-push and actual picture taking. I even asked my husband to move around and wave his arms and alas, no softness, no halo. I managed to exchange the cameras and pay a $10 difference. I am very happy with my new purchase.I'm giving the Nikon Coolpix S550 2 stars because:Image quality  **Ease of use **Appearance ****Features ** (plenty, but they don't always work)Price for quality *

Reviews.Title: Coolpix S550
Reviews.Author: T. B. Amenell "Brent"
Reviews.Content: Beautiful camera.  Bought it for my 65 y/o dad for Christmas.  He's been upgraded from a 5MP 3X Zoom to 10MP with a 5X Zoom!  And he can still put it in his pocket if he wants.  Nice!

Reviews.Title: Cool Camera For Everyone
Reviews.Author: Manjeet S. Rekhi
Reviews.Content: Its a nice camera to have for everyone in the family.Pros - 10MP, sleek size, lightweight, 5x optical makes it very much in demand for any occasion. Another plus is rechargeable battery, no need to keep changing batteries.Cons - Found that while taking video, the sound level is not so great. But since my main criteria to buy this camera was for pictures only, and not video, it works for me.Overall, its a very good camera, and worth its cost.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: D. Wetherbee
Reviews.Content: The S550 is a great little camera.  Small enough to throw into my purse so I always have it.  The 5X zoom comes in handy.  The vibration reduction works very well.  Macro mode is perfect for closeups of wildflowers. Movie mode with sound is fun to use for those moments with the kids when you just have to catch all the movement.  Great supplement for my digital SLR and it's always with me because it's so small. I loaned mine to my daughter and she wouldn't give it back. I just gave one to my 80-year-old mother for an early Christmas present and it's easy enough for her to use and she's having a ball with it.  No more worries about how much film she's using.  She takes pictures of all the people in the retirement community where she lives and they all love posing and being silly and laughing over the results.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Gerald F. Strathman "bernman20062007"
Reviews.Content: My daughter was very happy when she opened the package. The camera is small enough & easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Beauchemin "mbeau89"
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing! Tons of shooting options and 5X zoom! Pictures have great detail and macro mode is phenomenal! All this fits into your pocket in a stylish point and shoot. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Great Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Laura Shaw "mom2triplets"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because my Sony Syber-shot was broken first the flash went and then I dropped it in the pool so it was time to get a new camera.  I didn't want to spend that much so I went with the Nikon as they were running a rebate sale.  So far I have had no issues but it's only been a month that I had the camera.  Love the video portion, big screen and the closer view on regular photos.  It's a great every day camera that you can leave in your pocketbook.  I'm glad I purchased this camera.

Reviews.Title: A cam to take with you
Reviews.Author: Eider Reis Dutra
Reviews.Content: this is very nice cam.the pics are great and it's really easy to handle.I liked it a lot.my other cam is a pro nikon and they have different applications but suits me fine.

Reviews.Title: cool coolpix
Reviews.Author: Clyde C. Walter
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera for a neighbor.That's because the price  was lower thru amazon than at a local camera store. I knew the neighbor would like the camera because I bought one for my wife earlier this year. Both my wife and the neighbor are very pleased with camera.

Reviews.Title: Coool camera
Reviews.Author: S. De Abreu
Reviews.Content: A really nice point and shoot..picture quality is very good,even at full zoom. Battery life a bit on the low side though. Overall a great buy at the price.

Reviews.Title: Sweet Camera
Reviews.Author: Steph Belgium
Reviews.Content: For some reason this camera was cheaper when I bought it a year ago but I love it.  I haven't regretted buying it or a second.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Kelli Degner
Reviews.Content: I wanted a pocket sized camera that could still have a good zoom and take good pics. This is it! It fits in my pocket and I can still take great snapshots. I have a Canon digital rebel that I use for artsy shots but this is great little camera for everything else.

Reviews.Title: Excellent & Simple
Reviews.Author: Iyad Issa "Eddy71"
Reviews.Content: Been a Nikon owner before and was very satisfied.The S550 delivers its promise, it's simple, effective and picture quality is great. No major flaws except may be for the battery cover which looks cheap and fragile.Bought it for me wife and she seems to love using it.

Reviews.Title: very good camera
Reviews.Author: M. Robertson "Scuba Diving"
Reviews.Content: A very good point and shoot camera. I have had several different Nikons cameras and I have enjoyed them all. This one takes really high quality pictures. The menu system is a little different than my Nikon L5 but I am able to adapt. So far the battery has been able to meet my needs. I may have to buy a second battery when I take it on travel. Overall I am very pleased with the camera. Nikon makes a very good product.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Matthew J. Krause
Reviews.Content: My wife loves this camera.  It fits in her purse and take fantastic pictures.

Reviews.Title: Cool Camera
Reviews.Author: Larry J. Poff "Poffmeister"
Reviews.Content: This camera is a very convenient size to carry around in my pocket and takes really nice pictures. It has lots of features.  I like it.

Reviews.Title: Small size and great pictures.
Reviews.Author: D. Jones
Reviews.Content: I was tired of lugging around my bigger digital camera so I chose this one.  Great pictures, great zoom, great features. This was a great purchase. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: small, time effecient, simple enough to use.
Reviews.Author: Lunamay "A Lavish Ravishment"
Reviews.Content: The camera was for my boyfriends birthday. This camera comes in a few different colors which I love because I'm all about variety and details (and his favorite color is blue so go me). When it arrived it came with everything it was suppose to, the color of the camera was what I expected, operating it is basic(it has a great feature similar to a cell phone that lets you pick any photo as a welcome screen, which is what i used so when he turned it on hee sees me holding a paper saying happy birthday). The dementions were good. It's maybe a fourth thicker than our old cam. However still a great compact size- but not so small that sausage like finger couldnt use it. Were having some flash-no flash/anti shake issues with it currently but im pretty sure it's because were too damn lazy to read the manuel. But the quality is great and i recommend it since the price isn't outrageous, if you need something even MORE basic, try my gay cam which has a total of 4 button, finepix A345. It sucks for those whos expectations for electronics are much higher for the technology we have today.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix S550 10MP digital camera is very cool
Reviews.Author: D. C. Cooper
Reviews.Content: The Nikon Coolpix S550 10MP digital camera I purchased a couple of weeks ago has worked just as advertised, takes great photos, and is actually smaller than expected. We are very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Cool is Right!
Reviews.Author: Little Star
Reviews.Content: This little camera can handle all your photo needs, making it a great buy for anyone who only wants to point and shoot as well as those who desire more control over camera effects.  It is surprisingly small, actually pocket-size, but with a nice large viewer.  I especially appreciate the automatic lens cover.  Photos and videos are of excellent quality, and the camera is easy to use.  The sleek design is eyecatching and makes toting a camera around much less of a burden!  They chose an appropriate name for this gem of a camera ~ it's really very cool!

Reviews.Title: A great pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Dan Ho
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for a vacation trip that we took a month ago, very pleased with the picture quality and battery life.  It also could read SDHC.  I would have given it a 5 if it could show the battery indicator on the display and come with a camera case.

Reviews.Title: COOL camera with great price and features
Reviews.Author: T. Nguyen "T  nguyen"
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this Nikon S550 from Amazon for under $200 with free shipping and no tax to California. If everyone read its specs., and compare price with other brands you could tell this is a good choice for camera under $200. The only cons. about this camera it only takes up to 4gb SDHC card.

Reviews.Title: My dream camera
Reviews.Author: S. WANI "Well Wisher"
Reviews.Content: Hi All,Myself a new user in case of digital cameras, I got a good deal on Amazon, I was looking for small handy digital camera with better resoultion, better optical zoom and I found it.I am using it and tried it lot, thereafter I recommend this product to all.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOL pix
Reviews.Author: A. Woodworth
Reviews.Content: Wow. This was by far the best purchase I have ever made on this site.I got this camera Brand new, No defects for 30$ cheaper than everywhere else sells it. Plus it was applicable to my Amazon Prime so I got it the day after I ordered it. :3Nikon Coolpix S550 10MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Cool Blue)

Reviews.Title: Small and Easy
Reviews.Author: Oliver Twist
Reviews.Content: Pros: Besides the color is very beautiful is a camera that meets all the requirements for a good photo.Cons: Penalty that the loading of the battery is not the USB.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied in South Carolina
Reviews.Author: D. Ray "Leonardo da Wainee"
Reviews.Content: My new Coolpix S550 does everything I expect it to do.  Foremost, it is very compact and fits into my pants or coat pocket so I can get shots when opportunities come up without the bother of lugging a bigger camera and also people are not put off by my looking like a dogged camera man.  It takes great pictures.  I still do not really like the new approach to photography using the little screen on the back of the camera instead of a traditional viewer.  However, I have two other digital cameras that fulfill the rest of my needs.  Nothing beats a nice Nikon or Cannon SLR.  But, they do not fit in my pocket and will do me no good if they are at home and I am out somewhere wishing I had my camera for that great unexpected opportunity shot.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed in Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Good Virginia
Reviews.Content: I have to agree with other reviewers who said there were too many blurry pictures. I took over 70 pictures on the day I received this camera. Only five or six turned out good. My last digital camera was a Canon PowerShot A510 with 3.2 mp. I have many hundreds (maybe thousands) of excellent pictures from that camera. The Coolpix was very disappointing. What good is 10 mp when the pictures are blurred? Right away I boxed up the Coolpix and returned it to Amazon. I ordered the Canon PowerShot SX100 IS and received it today. Took about 30 pictures and only had a couple of blurry ones. OPTICAL IMAGE STABILIZER IS VERY IMPORTANT! This camera is not small and sleek but the weight and contour make picture taking very much more stable and comfortable. This 8 mp is the camera I'm going to keep and enjoy. And the 10x optical zoom is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Distortioned pictures when I use the Zoom
Reviews.Author: Alejandra P. Duron Jerez
Reviews.Content: I went to an event, where I was not to far from the stage, but when I tried the zoom in this camera to take the pictures, all of them were of a very distortioned quality image... For this to be a 10 MP camera... you would expect excellent quality image... by the way, I had it in 10 MP. When I saw the pictures in my computer I was really disappointed, because they are not worth printing. I used to have a Nikon 8MP P1, which a thief stole from my brother and so I bought this one to replace it, but there is definitely no comparison. I do not recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Repair within 30 days
Reviews.Author: Craig C. Schmidt
Reviews.Content: Great Pictures!. I highly recommend buying from a local dealer. My camera stop working within 30 days and I had to ship it to Nikon for repair. Saved a little money on the purchase but just spent $13.00 packaging and shipping for the repair.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coopix S550
Reviews.Author: M. Fischer "fishnibble"
Reviews.Content: I like this camera very much. It is easy to use and small enough to take anywhere.  I also bought the accesory to reduce red eye and give me more light in low light areas. It was possible for me to take pictures of my dog who is all black and actually see her.

Reviews.Title: Distorted pictures
Reviews.Author: Long Beach Larry
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this camera for a special trip to New York and was very disappointed with it.  It is small, fast and convenient which are big pluses.  However, almost all of my pictures that had any straight lines like buildings were all distorted no matter what zoom I used or whether the straight lines were on the sides or closer to the center of the picture.  This essentially makes the camera useless hence the 1 star rating.  Every straight line was bowed and thus does not look natural.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed-buyer beware!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Robotixfan
Reviews.Content: I just purchased the Nikon Coolpix S550 today. I was excited reading several reviews and listening to the salesperson rave about this product. I currently shoot with a Nikon D80 and my spare is a D40. These are amazing cameras in the DSLR category. I figured I should buy a Nikon point-and-shoot to bring along when I am at Disneyland or other places a full size DSLR would not be so convenient. I was frustrated right off the bat when I was taking sample shots of my child. The time it took to take a single photo seemed to take 5 seconds. I made all the in-camera adjustments and it seemed to get worse. The quality was simply horrible no matter what lighting I used and no matter which ISO setting I set. The VR feature was nonexistent when activated. I bought this setting my expectations low compared to the DSLR. But these photos should have some decent quality to them. It had none. Sorry Nikon, this one didn't cut it. Not sure what I will buy to replace this one

Reviews.Title: not user friendly
Reviews.Author: M. G. H. "proudmom"
Reviews.Content: This camera is not user friendly. You have to turn it on, to select the features cause it's touch screen and it's slow too. I missed a very precious moment in my life, my baby's heart beat in my belly. I couldn't find the audio recorder fast enough cause the menu has many icons. I returned this camera and got a cannon. The cannon is so much better. The buttons are right there and you don't even have to turn the camera on if you want video, you just select video. The quality of photos are the same. When it comes to split second precious moments, you want something that you can just grab and use.

Reviews.Title: Not a digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Sravan K. Thokala
Reviews.Content: I got this Camera from Beach Camera. I don't know if this is new product or used one as they sold me in original package and all items. It didn't matter me in the beginning. I'm fond of Nikon digital cameras and though other brands were offering great cameras at the same price, I regret buying this product. The image it takes when in "all Auto mode" is so dull and unclear that I really feel sick after looking at the image in its LCD, Computer or TV. My Old camera with 3MP has much clarity in the image than this 10MP camera. I suggest the buyer not to purchase this model and esp from Beach Camera.Sravan.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the Nikon name
Reviews.Author: M. Turano
Reviews.Content: I read these reviews too, thinking there was no possible way Nikon could produce what all these people were complaining about.  Oof.  Was I wrong!  Don't even try taking indoor pictures without flash.  They will come out looking like 90's era webcam pictures.  I tried a few shots with a tripod and they came out half decent, so make sure you take one of those along with you.  Not quality work from a company that knows better.

Reviews.Title: Has some drawbacks
Reviews.Author: J. Taylor
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I had a Nikon film camera I paid nothing for in 1990 and it took incredible pictures.  I have always admired Nikon lenses.Has no one else experienced the MIRROR that the LCD screen becomes in bright sunlight?  My other digital camera "grays out" in bright sun but this one is a MIRROR....there is no way to even guess at what you are pointing the lens at.  A viewfinder would not just be for nostalgia, it would be USEFUL for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: L. Reynolds
Reviews.Content: I'm very satisfied with my camera. I was reading all these reviews on this website about it the good and the bad, which started to freak me out. But I bought the camera anyway .. and the little I've used it, it's been great. I took this amazing picture of a flower one day and I just can't believe how clear and crisp the picture is. All the features are fun trying to figure out. I haven't really done much with them, but I'm excited to. The camera is so much smaller than my older one that I'm afraid I'm going to break it and it usually falls out of my hand easily so I always wear the wrist band. Very happy with my camera. Just still unsure about the battery because my other camera used regular batteries. That's all. Yay.

Reviews.Title: Little dissapointed
Reviews.Content: I'm not an expert but te quality of the picture, the color and definition wasn't good, thanks god I bought this in amazon, and got my refound!

Reviews.Title: Buy a Canon
Reviews.Author: FireDawg-55
Reviews.Content: Let me start by writing I own a Nikon CoolPix S1 that I am VERY happy with. I bought the S550 as an upgrade after a year of hard use of the S1. I'm in Iraq, lots of dust, dirt, things going BOOM &c.; Aside from that, the S1 didn't take the then new SD HC cards and the S550 does.What the S550 does NOT do that causes me to write a negative review of it is take decent macro photos. Even when I get green brackets on the screen more than one-half of the photo will come out blurry. Generally what happens is I won't even get green brackets, just red ones; those photos more often than not, turn out okay.Additionally, when set in macro mode, the lens keeps trying to focus on whatever direction the camera happens to be pointed in. There really is no such thing as close focusing with this camera, say anything less than 12 inches.Another thing I do not like about the camera. The S1 has a fixed lens which works fine. The S550's lens protrudes from the body, giving the aforementioned dust and dirt easy entry into the camera body.Lastly, and this is really annoying, one has to remove the battery from the camera and place it in a separate charger to charge it. The S1 has its own mini-docking station that charges the battery AND downloads the photos to my computer. The S550's separate battery charger is a real step backwards.Overall, I do not like this product, would NOT recommend its purchase to anyone and definitely would not purchase another one.

Reviews.Title: Not Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Meghi
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my Panosonic and I am not satisfied.It takes great pics outside, but in my house (lighting ist good) the pictures come out blurry. It has a hard time focusing on objects and when you press the button all the way it loses the focus (if you actually got a focus)I wanted a simple point and shoot and this is far from it. All the shots in my apt come out blurry. My Panasonic did not have this problem.I will be returning this,

Reviews.Title: Bad camera choice
Reviews.Author: Juan C. Medina Frias "arqmedina"
Reviews.Content: In low light conditions this camara don't work at all, I've tried every possible setting with no success, good looks but terrible photos, with very good light the photos are just OK, please check another options before buying this thing!

Reviews.Title: Great Full-featured camera
Reviews.Author: Gary C. Crockenberg "Crock"
Reviews.Content: Does everything you want and it does it well. Nice photo camera and does a decent video with sound also. Long lasting rechargeable battery and EZ to use.It makes a Panarama shot, too! Also records AUDIO ONLY.Get at least a 1 GIG card with it so you have plenty of room for your pics and videos. Small enough to carry around in your purse, unless you're a man and you might not be in the habit of walking around with a purse. But, if you ARE a MAN if you want to carry a purse; that's your own business; not mine. the point is: IT'S A GREAT CAMERA! I got the pink one. NIKON calls it "Plum". It's really more like PINK. Nobody will steal a man's PINK Camera!

Reviews.Title: so far so good - great value
Reviews.Author: John W. Pusey "jay"
Reviews.Content: This product was like new - great value, at this point I couldn't be happier - that the same time I am not that particular about cameras.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Andrew Heflin "Heflin"
Reviews.Content: Nice easy to use camera with excellent picture quality.  Had a 16x24 poster made off of camera turned out great.  One down fall is i had to purchase a new battery within a year.  If you do have to replace battery make sure you get the real nikon battery.  I found out from experience the cheap money saving battery is really that cheap.  but otherwise best camera we have every owned.  We bought our kids nikon cameras also.

Reviews.Title: A VERY BAD EXPERIENCE!!!
Reviews.Author: Lucy Ortega Castilla "shopper"
Reviews.Content: Even though this is a very good product and It is what i expected, my experience buying it was awful.  I payed for a brand new camera and when I received it, it was beaten.  I read the operation manual and I wanted to configurate the camera and then was when I noticed that the camera has been used.  It seems that it was the camera that has been used in the store for demonstration because the memory was full of photos of the store!!  There was 30 photos of the store in the memory of the camera.  The name of the store is Beach Camera and they sent me a used and beaten camera.  I wrote an email to the store but I never got an answer.  And I can't go to the store personally because I am living in another country.  This really was a very bad experience for me, I was fooled by these people.

Reviews.Title: for  all time.
Reviews.Author: Maria Rutila Hernandez Lopez "ruth"
Reviews.Content: For all time.Captured  every moment that you need. It is practical, light, and easy to used.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: C. Villarreal "Fede"
Reviews.Content: Nice Camera but the battey is not compatible with previous nikon models.I have Nikon Coolpix S220 and I wolud like use the battery as backup and is not possible.

Reviews.Title: Issues with lighting & delayed flash
Reviews.Author: J. Caldwell "circlegirl13"
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for several months & have tried mostly night & indoor shots.  I've found the flash takes an eternity & is just too bright.  Adjusting the ISO makes no difference.  I had better luck adjusting for lighting with my old cannon powershot.  I admit there might be some tricks I just don't know about.  Please share if you have any.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera, very small, nice photos, easy to use, light weight, I love it!

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: Mehmet Ali Piskin
Reviews.Content: You cannot take wonderful pictures with this machine, but quality is good enough for everyday use. This product has a high performance/price ratio.

Reviews.Title: nikcon coolpix
Reviews.Author: Geoffrey Cassady
Reviews.Content: Gives great pictures. Simple to use and down load my pics to computer.  No problem with the color. Zoom is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Sammy Lewis
Reviews.Content: My niece loved it!  Her Mom was not able to afford it for her for Christmas, so I wanted to make her day by giving her the camera she wanted and loves it sooooo much.  She is very happy and over joyed!!!:):):)

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coopix
Reviews.Author: Joseph Sisti "reader"
Reviews.Content: Great point and shoot camera, lots of options for the price, Plus a 5x zoom which is better than most point and shoots

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Love Nails "Gi Gi"
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift and the person loves it. Easy operation with high quality results. It's also a nice compact design but with a big viewing screen.

Reviews.Title: It's compact and nice
Reviews.Author: LuvU4ever ""Chunli""
Reviews.Content: Compact and nice. When shoot is hires sometimes it shows lots of pixel. the pictures are not as clear. Overall, it's is a fine, compact camera for everyday use.

Reviews.Title: Nikon coolpix s550
Reviews.Author: Joseph Presti
Reviews.Content: A great camera a very good price my wife loves it.For my money I do not think you can find a better camer.

Reviews.Title: Great stuff.
Reviews.Author: John Dorian "JD"
Reviews.Content: Camera is perfectly new and specifications are what was described by seller.  Great shipping and got it by Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix 550
Reviews.Author: C. Martin
Reviews.Content: This is an easy to use, wonderful quality camera.  The ease and use of the camera is great.  I highly recommend this camera for novice and expert photographers.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Bruce Yahnke Jr.
Reviews.Content: The camera is just what we wanted.  The price was the best out their, and shipping was quick!

Reviews.Title: My Wife  and Myself Liike It
Reviews.Author: Rickey H. Gundy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a trip to Vegas, got it a day or two before our trip, read the Quick Start and a few things in the manual and had no problems.

Reviews.Title: Grainy
Reviews.Author: P. L. Tsan
Reviews.Content: the pics are great after u take it but when u are taking it, it is grainy.i would recommend this to ppl who dont mind the screen being grainy, but the pics r great and clear

Reviews.Title: Excelente!
Reviews.Author: Betrue
Reviews.Content: Muy buena cámara!. Mi entusiasmo quizás sea porque es justo lo que estaba buscando. Cómoda, alta definición, buen zoom, perfecta para lo que la quiero.

Reviews.Title: Watch Out
Reviews.Author: Alexander R. Moorhead IV
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera on Amazon from a company that is no longer in business and took my camera on vacation. I took a few pics with it and was happy with the performance except for the fast moving images, but I could get by. Then the LCD went black and I took some pictures and sometimes the picture would show up on the LCD and sometimes it would not. It's not even 2 months old and Nikon won't warranty it cause (1) the shop I bought it from no longer exists and (2) the shop was in Washington state and they have different warranties for a few of the states. I'm in California. I won't be buying another Nikon.

Reviews.Title: 1 1/2 months and only one good shot
Reviews.Author: S.G.
Reviews.Content: After 4 years with my Samsung 5 megapixel camera I decided it was time to upgrade. My friend had a Nikon that was so old the megapixels weren't included in the specs - but it takes GREAT pics. Other friends tried to woo me with Canon's but in the end the Nikon won outI bought this Nikon S550 camera the day after thanksgiving - after taking 255 photos - I only have two good shots. The subject of these 'good shots'? water beads on a banana leaf in Barbados - perfect lighting and vibrant greens. That's about where my good impression stops. The other 253 pics are rather grainy and the colors don't stay true. The specs sound good but this camera is going back to it's maker - today!

Reviews.Title: Ashton Krutcher did me wrong :(
Reviews.Author: Hayley Knighten
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with this camera. I was warned about Nikons and told to go with a Canon instead but I was sold on some favorable reviews and attractive commercials.The worst thing about this camera is that it does have VR stabilization which reduces the shake caused by the photographer but not of the subject. Do not buy this camera if you plan to shoot any moving subject. Even people waving will come up as a blur and if you have kids or pets don't even think about it. There is a reason the customer images from this camera are all still photos--those are the only decent ones this Nikon can take.Oh, and forget about shooting indoors. The noise level is ridiculous even after raising the ISO and trying the Party/Indoors setting. The indoors setting is actually worse since it makes all your photos look like watercolor paintings.Additionally, this camera--even on most still subjects--cannot take a sharp picture. Compare the customer pics of this camera to that of the Canon Powershot 1100 and you'll see what I mean. The lines of the subject have a fuzzy look and the colors are bland. You can use the vibrant colors feature but that makes the photos look like still frames from an old technicolor movie. Skin tones are either pale white/grey or orange. The latter is especially true when you are shooting indoors.Also, don't believe Ashton--this camera is larger and slower than the Canon Powershot 1100. I missed many a great photo opportunity waiting for the camera to focus or I shot the pic and got a blurry mess.Oh, and I read the manual cover to cover and am a paid photographer so don't be fooled by reviews that tell you that you'll be fine if you do the reading. These people clearly do not have an eye for quality.My recommendation for sharp photos and natural skin tones is any of the Canon Powershots. Olympus is also a great brand. I just picked up the Powershot 1100 and love it! The pictures are sharp and natural looking when taken on the basic settings. There is even a kids and pets setting, which, for a mom like me is wonderful. Oh, and did I mention that the powershot is cheaper? Do yourself a favor and check out the canons instead. If you don't believe me read the cnet reviews which name the powershot one of the five best compact digital cameras on the market. You can find these review at [...]

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: voodoo
Reviews.Content: This camera is very nice for the price, but for a 5x zoom it wasn't much better than my old 3x zoom.

Reviews.Title: coolpix
Reviews.Author: DFW
Reviews.Content: Easy and fun to use and great looking pics too.  Very happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love this little camera
Reviews.Author: katelynd3
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and love it. I travel a lot and its great to take on trips. It takes good pictures and has a good amount of settings. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing and Purple
Reviews.Author: Belgachick
Reviews.Content: It's really hard to find a purple camera, which is what first drew me to it.  However, all the features are amazing.  I'm a huge fan of the "Smile" feature.

Reviews.Title: Camera leaves me feeling like something is missing
Reviews.Author: Carrie Acrey "evilcarrielouise"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace one I had because my older fujifilm took quite a lot of abuse.  It is overall a very nice camera and has some great features like face recognition, photo grid, blink warning, but maybe it's just me, it takes some photos a little too clear.  I did not realize that my freckles were so prominant.  That is not my only complaint about the camera though.  I love the fact that the battery is rechargeable but it seems to not last very long. Overall it is a very nice camera but I believe it is more suited for landscape and photography rather than portraits.  Also, pictures have a blue hue to them making them seem sort of sad.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Calvin
Reviews.Content: I purchased the S550 a few weeks ago and so far, I like it very much.  It is small, fits in your pocket and takes great photo's.  The extra 2X optical zoom, 5X total, (most camera's of this size are 3X), really makes a difference.  It has a variety of modes for different shooting and lighting conditions.  For the price, it's a great value.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: N. Graham
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with our decision to purchase this Camera.  It was the best price we found anywhere and arrived sooner than we thought.

Reviews.Title: not good compare to 8MP
Reviews.Author: R. Genipudi
Reviews.Content: I am not satisfied with this product.Before i used Nikon8.1MP.That was great.This is not that much giving qualified pictures.

Reviews.Title: Art's Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Nerd Art "Nerd Art"
Reviews.Content: Everything you would want from a small camera  EXCEPT it does  not give you instructions to download and print a panoramic picture.Nikon Coolpix S550 10MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Cool Blue)

Reviews.Title: Not wide enough
Reviews.Author: L. Da Vinci "Renaissance Man"
Reviews.Content: One big attraction of this camera is its size, making it easier to take it anywhere.One drawback of the camera is that its lens is not wide enough, an important feature.The lens is not as sharp as those of previous models.There are other cameras in this price range that have better features. The money Nikon has recently spent on advertising this camera, with highly paid celebrities, could have been used to lower the selling price of the cameras.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Poser "mlp"
Reviews.Content: -takes forever to take a picture-extremely blurry when not using flash (even when put on a table where there is not wobbliness that would make the picture blurry)-pictures come out very grainy at timesbuy the canon powershot instead.

Reviews.Title: Getting pictures from camera sooooo slow.
Reviews.Author: Jeff Smith "tube book guy"
Reviews.Content: If you use the usb cable, it takes forever.You will have remove the SD card and put it into a reader.

Reviews.Title: Excelente pero con un par de detalles.
Reviews.Author: Javier D. Volcan
Reviews.Content: La calidad de las fotos es muy pero muy buena. Esperaba que el sistema antivibracion (VR) fuera un poco mas efectivo pero funciona bien, quizás lo único que no me convence es que es un poco lenta para procesar la fotografía tomada y eso que uso una tarjeta SD-HC

Reviews.Title: coolpix
Reviews.Author: Jeanne
Reviews.Content: Nikon Coolpix S51 8.1MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Vibration Reduction Zoom (Matte Black)great camera-best price-immediate deliveryTOTAL SATISFACTION!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: This camera sucks
Reviews.Author: Interested Reader "Interested Reader"
Reviews.Content: This camera is garbage. I just returned it. First of all, it doesn't come with an SD card, which is unprecedented for this type of ultra-compact consumer camera. Second, when you take out the battery to re-charge it, all of the camera settings including date and time are lost. So, every time you re-charge, you must re-program the camera from scratch. Third, the user interface and controls are very poorly designed and hard to use. Fourth, the feeling is terrible, the controls have a wobbly and low quality feeling. The camera actually takes fantastic pictures, the best I have ever seen from a compact camera, but that doesn't outweigh all the problems.

Reviews.Title: nicon coolpix
Reviews.Author: J. Pietra
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband but he does not like it because of the time it takes for the lens to come out and take a picture.

Reviews.Title: 8GB Card?
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Cathcart
Reviews.Content: Anyone tried an 8GB card in this camera? It looks like from the Nikon site that 4GB is the max but on some of the card sites they seem to say it will take an 8GB card. Can't find any concrete info.

Reviews.Title: MACRO
Reviews.Author: Hilda De Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Compre la camara para uso de mi consultorio necesito para tomar fotografias Macro de lesiones de piel.Mi sorpresa es que el macro de esta camara es de muy mala calidad, dificil de enfocar, cuando disparas hasta la mitad se desenfoca.He tenido  mucha camaras digitales y hasta mi primera camara digital Sony (1997) toma aceramientos de mejor calidad.Creo que vino defectuosa o de lo contrario es muy MALA.Las otras funciones quizas no sean tan malas,pero para lo que la quieo No sirve

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix 10 MP
Reviews.Author: Syed A. Jehangir "saj"
Reviews.Content: I thought it will be the best digital camera I ever had but it was not at all. What I did is send it back and requested for the refund.I would not suggest anybody to buy this one!
